data.name: Summer Night's Recollection
data.description: The scenery perfectly recreates the lively atmosphere found in the festivals of Inazuma.\nInazuma City holds several festivals each year, but the biggest, most memorable ones often fall during the middle of summer. The food stalls, games, and fireworks in the night sky will make visitor linger a little longer. The stalls may disappear after the last day, but the good times shared with companions will last forever.

text.text: These stalls look to have been quite carefully arranged.
It's a little deserted here, but it's enough for us to put aside our troubles and enjoy some festive fun and relaxation. Even if it's just the two of us, and even if it's our own kind of festival.
Thank you. This truly makes me happy.
Oh boy, you did not disappoint. This festive street is exactly my scene!
...Time to get serious, though. Let's pick a stall and go head-to-head, winner takes it all!
The loser has to, uhh... has to run around the place three times while shouting to the winner, "All Hail, King of the Festival!"
Ah... this reminds me of when Ayaka was young, and we would visit the festival together...
It's immaculate. Even I, as Yashiro Commissioner, cannot find any fault with the way you have designed this place.
Since it's just the two of us here... shall we take a stroll together?
